channel.title: +Articles on आगमे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +Articles on आगमे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: Temple ritual
item.description: Source GA Sanctuary design The concept of a main sanctuary for a main deity of a temple with subsidiary sanctuaries for other deities with the main sanctuary being a small, dark chamber & daily rites being done to it at morning, mid-day & evening — paralleling the गर्भगृह-परिवार-नित्यार्चन model of आगम-s. Note that the Egyptian temple is a microcosmic image of creation, with innermost sanctuary of the temple representing the primeval island which emerged out of the primordial ocean & creation of life begun.
